Docs.param: Key of the composite (that contains settings)
Docs.summary: Save a group of items by its key in a composite. This method should be considered for objects that do not exceed 8k bytes during the lifetime of the application (refers to for complex/large objects) and for groups of settings which need to be treated in an atomic way.
